Penny found her way to the group, and tried telling Mr. Horns about what she saw.
Instead of helping, he got really annoyed and scolded Penny, telling her it's not time for jokes.
Apperantly someone from the staff told him Poppy was not feeling well and headed home.
But Penny hasn't seen her again after that.

Penny returned to the group and headed home after the tour.
Poppy was never seen again after that day.

Penny got caught.
